Latest HOrse Racing News

  • Best Final Finish Times, Biggest Longshot Winners Ever: A history of the Belmont Stakes

    June 9, 2023

    This year marks the 155th running of the Belmont Stakes. It is the oldest of the three races of the Triple Crown but not the most famous. The race predates the Preakness by six years and the Kentucky Derby by eight years. Unlike the other two races, however, the venue for the Belmont Stakes has… Read…

    Continue Reading

  • What Time Does the Belmont Stakes Go Off and Where Can I Watch it?

    June 9, 2023

    The third and final installment of horse racing’s Triple Crown will occur on Saturday, June 10th at Belmont Park in Elmont, New York. The race is 1 ½ miles long and will feature some of the best 3-year-old horses in the world. This will be the 155th running of the classic race and the post… Read…

    Continue Reading

  • Where you can bet on the 2023 Belmont Stakes: Online and In-Person

    June 9, 2023

    There are three ways to wager on the Belmont Stakes this Saturday. They include in-person at Belmont Park racetrack or at any number of legal OTB “Off-track betting” sites. You can also even bet online using one of a number of legal racebooks! State by State Legal Options to Bet on the Belmont Stakes State… Read…

    Continue Reading

  • Free Expert 2023 Belmont Stakes Picks with Exacta, Trifecta, and Superfecta Predictions

    June 9, 2023

    We’re on the final Jewel of the Triple Crown with the Belmont Stakes this Saturday, June 10th! If you’ve been following along, if you’ve seen my predictions on the Kentucky Derby and Preakness Stakes strike gold with winning Superfecta, Trifecta, and Exacta selections! Our winning streak thus far has set the stage for earning our… Read…

    Continue Reading

  • Tapit Shoes Prediction, Odds & Profile for the 2023 Belmont Stakes

    June 9, 2023

    Post Position: #1Probable Odds: 20-1Record: 5 Starts: 1 Win, 1 Second, 1 Third.Lifetime Earnings: $82,878Jockey: Jose OrtizTrainer: Brad CoxSire: TapitDam: Awesome Flower (Flower Alley) Tapit Shoes PREVIEW & ANALYSIS Tapit Shoes has already gotten off to a good start at the Belmont Stakes by drawing the first position in the race. In the history of… Read…

    Continue Reading

  • 2023 Belmont Stakes: Everything you Need to know

    June 9, 2023

    FEATURED ARTICLE Free Expert Belmont Stakes Exotic Picks: Exacta, Trifecta, and SUperfecta Predictions Our top racing expert, Mark Ruelle, cashed in the Exacta for the Kentucky Derby and NAILED the Preakness Superfecta this year. Join him in winning big AGAIN for the Belmont Stakes with his FREE Betting Strategy and Exotic Picks. Click here to… Read…

    Continue Reading

  • Red Route One Prediction, Odds, and Profile for the 2023 Belmont Stakes

    June 8, 2023

    Post Position: #9Probable Odds: 15-1Record: 10 Starts, 2 Wins, 2 Seconds, 1 ThirdLifetime Earnings: $732,545Jockey: Joel RosarioTrainer: Steve AsmussenSire.: Gun RunnerDam: Red House (Tapit) Red Route One Preview & Analysis Red Route One will be on the far outside at the Belmont Stakes, drawing the 9th position on Saturday. Only four horses in the history… Read…

    Continue Reading

  • National Treasure Prediction, Odds, and Profile for the 2023 Belmont Stakes

    June 8, 2023

    Post Position: #4Probable Odds: 5-1Record: 6 starts, 2 Wins, 1 Second, 2 ThirdsLifetime Earnings: $1,335,900Jockey: John VelazquezTrainer: Bob BaffertSire: Quality RoadDam: Treasure (Medaglia D’oro) National Treasure Preview & Analysis The #4 position at the Belmont Stakes went to Preakness winner National Treasure, trained by legendary trainer Bob Baffert. Horses have won the Belmont Stakes 10… Read…

    Continue Reading

  • Il Miracolo Prediction, Odds, and Profile for the 2023 Belmont Stakes

    June 8, 2023

    Post Position: #5Probable Odds: 30-1Record: 10 Starts, 2 Wins, 3 Seconds, 0 ThirdLifetime Earnings: $103,125Jockey: Marcos MenesesTrainer: Antonio SanoSire: Gun RunnerDam: Tapit’s World (Tapit) Il Miracolo Preview & Analysis Tied for the second-highest position to win the Belmont, the #5 position went to Il Miracolo in Tuesday’s draw.  15 times a horse has won the… Read…

  • Forte Prediction, Odds, and Profile for the 2023 Belmont Stakes

    June 8, 2023

    Post Position: #6Probable Odds: 5-2Record: 7 starts: 6 Wins, 0 Second, 0 ThirdLifetime Earnings: $2,409,830Jockey: Irad Ortiz, JrTrainer: Todd PletcherSire: ViolenceDam: Queen Caroline (Blame) Forte Preview & Analysis Finally, Forte makes his long-awaited debut in a Triple Crown race this year. Expected to contend at the Kentucky Derby, Forte was a late scratch and then… Read…
